snippet: Florida Attorney General Pam Bondi on Thursday filed a notice of an appeal in federal court on Thursday challenging a ruling last month by a U.S. district judge that declared the state's gay marriage ban unconstitutional....

headline.print_headline: Florida Officials Seek to Appeal Ruling Against Gay Marriage Ban
headline.main: Florida Officials Seek to Appeal Ruling Against Gay Marriage Ban

lead_paragraph: Florida Attorney General Pam Bondi on Thursday filed a notice of an appeal in federal court on Thursday challenging a ruling last month by a U.S. district judge that declared the state's gay marriage ban unconstitutional.
